Title: Updates from the Poezio ecosystem
Description:
Releases have happened recently that revolve around Poezio, a TUI
(Terminal UI) client for XMPP, including Poezio itself, its backend XMPP
library Slixmpp, and also the poezio and
slixmpp plugins for OMEMO.

Title: Scala's Gitter to Discord migration mistake
Description: The Scala community is increasingly using Discord for ‚Äúreal-time chat‚Äù. This was announced in December, and the community page lists several Discord ‚Äúservers‚Äù, one of them belonging to Typelevel. I think this move from Gitter to Discord is probably a mistake.

Title: Use CSS.escape() to escape QuerySelectorAll()
Description: Ran into an issue recently where a querySelector operation was failing in document link navigation when navigating hashes. There are a few issues at work when using Hash navigation but one issue i didn't expect to run into was a naming conflict of a hash tag that interfered with CSS operators. Turns out there's an easy solution around with with CSS.escape - if you can make the connection. In this post I talk about the problem how it might show up and how to fix it.

Title: An Ode To Paper Todos
Description:
I love a todo list. It captures my goals and desires in a semi-succinct and concrete way. There are hundreds if not thousands of todo apps and methods. But to me personally, one stands out above all the others.
A simple 3x5 notecard.
This is a how-to or a help article. This is a love letter.
A love letter to paper.
The simple idea of writing down your list of things to do on a physical surface with your own hand is something I love.

Title: An Ode to Apple's Hide My Email
